page.title: 17HOME LIFE
page.content: People who live in this area are quite lucky. They are reasonably well off although there are some poorer people in the villages. Most people live in a semi-detached house they have a family with two or three children. Pets are vey popular because there is plenty of room for dogs. In cities there is nowhere for dogs to play so most people have cats. Some people have horses. Alot of children have their own computers and they play games on them. people also watch T.V. alot some have video recorders and can watch films. This is good as there is no cinema. Boys usually play out after school but girls go to each others houses and play games with dolls. Adults can watch T.V. or do jobs about the house. In summer they dig the garden and grow flowers.
